verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְאֵה֖וּד <S%H164><s%> ve-'e-Hud when Ehud מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> Met. was dead

וַיִּמְכְּרֵ֣ם <S%H4376><s%> vai-yim-ke-Rem sold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad them into the hand יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> ya-Vin of Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach that reigned בְּחָצ֑וֹר <S%H2674><s%> be-cha-Tzor; in Hazor וְשַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> ve-sar- the captain צְבָאוֹ֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'O of whose host סִֽיסְרָ֔א <S%H5516><s%> sis-Ra, [was] Sisera וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelt בַּחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H2800><s%> ba-cha-Ro-shet in Harosheth הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim. of the Gentiles

וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'a-Ku cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תְּשַׁ֨ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' for he had nine מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred רֶֽכֶב־ <S%H7393><s%> re-chev- chariots בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel of iron ל֔וֹ lo, וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> Ve-hu and he לָחַ֞ץ <S%H3905><s%> la-Chatz oppressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּחָזְקָ֖ה <S%H2394><s%> be-cha-ze-Kah he mightily עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years ס sa-Mek

וּדְבוֹרָה֙ <S%H1683><s%> u-de-vo-Rah And Deborah אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah the wife נְבִיאָ֔ה <S%H5031><s%> ne-vi-'Ah, a prophetess אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife לַפִּיד֑וֹת <S%H3941><s%> lap-pi-Dot; of Lapidoth הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he שֹׁפְטָ֥ה <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-Tah she judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi. he

וְ֠הִיא <S%H1931><s%> Ve-hi he יוֹשֶׁ֨בֶת <S%H3427><s%> yo-She-vet And she dwelt תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> ta-chat- under תֹּ֜מֶר <S%H8560><s%> To-mer under the palm tree דְּבוֹרָ֗ה <S%H1683><s%> de-vo-Rah, of Deborah בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> bein between הָרָמָ֛ה <S%H7414><s%> ha-ra-Mah between Ramah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el and Bethel בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu came up אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha and to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> lam-mish-Pat. to her for judgment

וַתִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach, And she sent וַתִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra and called לְבָרָ֣ק <S%H1301><s%> le-va-Rak Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֔עַם <S%H42><s%> 'a-vi-No-'am, of Abinoam מִקֶּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6943><s%> mik-Ke-desh out of Kedeshnaphtali נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li; of Naphtali וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo Behold צִוָּ֣ה׀ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto him Hath not the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei- God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go וּמָֽשַׁכְתָּ֙ <S%H4900><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta and draw בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har toward mount תָּב֔וֹר <S%H8396><s%> ta-Vor, Tabor וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta and take עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha, you עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret with thee ten אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li of Naphtali וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei and of the children זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun. of Zebulun

וּמָשַׁכְתִּ֨י <S%H4900><s%> u-ma-shach-Ti And I will draw אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto thee to the river קִישׁ֗וֹן <S%H7028><s%> ki-Shon, Kishon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> si-se-Ra Sisera שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- the captain צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va army יָבִ֔ין <S%H2985><s%> ya-Vin, of Jabin's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רִכְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7393><s%> rich-Bo with his chariots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-No; and his multitude וּנְתַתִּ֖יהוּ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-hu and I will deliver בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha. him into thine hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha then בָּרָ֔ק <S%H1301><s%> ba-Rak, And Barak אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- to her If תֵּלְכִ֥י <S%H1980><s%> te-le-Chi with me then I will go עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi with וְהָלָ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-La-che-ti; will go וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo you will not תֵלְכִ֛י <S%H1980><s%> te-le-Chi go עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech. go

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer And she said הָלֹ֧ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch I will surely אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech that thou takest עִמָּ֗ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, thee אֶ֚פֶס <S%H657><s%> 'E-fes with thee notwithstanding כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִֽהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become תִּֽפְאַרְתְּךָ֗ <S%H8597><s%> tif-'ar-te-Cha, shall not be for thine honour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech the journey אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you are about הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech, to take כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki into בְֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> ve-yad- into the hand אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, of a woman יִמְכֹּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> yim-Kor shall sell יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סִֽיסְרָ֑א <S%H5516><s%> sis-Ra; Sisera וַתָּ֧קָם <S%H6965><s%> vat-Ta-kom arose דְּבוֹרָ֛ה <S%H1683><s%> de-vo-Rah And Deborah וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech and went עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with בָּרָ֖ק <S%H1301><s%> ba-Rak with Barak קֶֽדְשָׁה׃ <S%H6943><s%> Ked-shah. to Kedesh

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <S%H2199><s%> vai-yaz-'Ek called בָּרָ֜ק <S%H1301><s%> ba-Rak And Barak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זְבוּלֻ֤ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נַפְתָּלִי֙ <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li and Naphtali קֶ֔דְשָׁה <S%H6943><s%> Ked-shah, to Kedesh וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and he went up בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-Lav, at his feet עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret with ten אַלְפֵ֖י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וַתַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> vat-Ta-'al went up עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with דְּבוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H1683><s%> de-vo-Rah. and Deborah

וְחֶ֤בֶר <S%H2268><s%> ve-Che-ver Now Heber הַקֵּינִי֙ <S%H7017><s%> hak-kei-Ni the Kenite נִפְרָ֣ד <S%H6504><s%> nif-Rad had severed מִקַּ֔יִן <S%H7017><s%> mik-Ka-yin, himself from the Kenites מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei [which was] of the children חֹבָ֖ב <S%H2246><s%> cho-Vav of Hobab חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> cho-Ten the father in law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; of Moses וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet and pitched אָהֳל֔וֹ <S%H168><s%> o-ho-Lo, his tent עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far אֵל֥וֹן <S%H436><s%> e-Lon unto the plain; בַּצְעַנִּים batz-'an-nim כבְּצַעֲנַנִּ֖ים <S%H6815><s%> be-tza-'a-nan-Nim Zaannannim קאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- is near קֶֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6943><s%> Ke-desh. which [is] by Kedesh

וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Gi-du And they shewed לְסִֽיסְרָ֑א <S%H5516><s%> le-si-se-Ra; Sisera כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עָלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah was gone up בָּרָ֥ק <S%H1301><s%> ba-Rak that Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֖עַם <S%H42><s%> 'a-vi-No-'am of Abinoam הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- to mount תָּבֽוֹר׃ <S%H8396><s%> ta-Vor. Tabor ס sa-Mek

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <S%H2199><s%> vai-yaz-'Ek gathered together סִֽיסְרָ֜א <S%H5516><s%> sis-Ra And Sisera אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all רִכְבּ֗וֹ <S%H7393><s%> rich-Bo, all his chariots תְּשַׁ֤ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' [even] nine מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> Re-chev chariots בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel, of iron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To; from מֵחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H2800><s%> me-cha-Ro-shet that [were] with him from Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the Gentiles אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto the river קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7028><s%> ki-Shon. of Kishon
